11#include "modules/audio_processing/agc2/fixed_digital_level_estimator.h"
12
13#include <algorithm>
14#include <cmath>
15
16#include "api/array_view.h"
17#include "modules/audio_processing/logging/apm_data_dumper.h"
18#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
19
20namespace webrtc {
21namespace {
22
23constexpr float kInitialFilterStateLevel = 0.f;
24
25// Instant attack.
26constexpr float kAttackFilterConstant = 0.f;
27// This is computed from kDecayMs by
28// 10 ** (-1/20 * subframe_duration / kDecayMs).
29// |subframe_duration| is |kFrameDurationMs / kSubFramesInFrame|.
30// kDecayMs is defined in agc2_testing_common.h
31constexpr float kDecayFilterConstant = 0.9998848773724686f;
32
33} // namespace
34
35FixedDigitalLevelEstimator::FixedDigitalLevelEstimator(
36 int sample_rate_hz,
37 ApmDataDumper* apm_data_dumper)
38 : apm_data_dumper_(apm_data_dumper),
39 filter_state_level_(kInitialFilterStateLevel) {
40 SetSampleRate(sample_rate_hz);
41 CheckParameterCombination();
42 RTC_DCHECK(apm_data_dumper_);
43 apm_data_dumper_->DumpRaw("agc2_level_estimator_samplerate", sample_rate_hz);
44}
45
46void FixedDigitalLevelEstimator::CheckParameterCombination() {
47 RTC_DCHECK_GT(samples_in_frame_, 0);
48 RTC_DCHECK_LE(kSubFramesInFrame, samples_in_frame_);
49 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(samples_in_frame_ % kSubFramesInFrame, 0);
50 RTC_DCHECK_GT(samples_in_sub_frame_, 1);
51}
52
53std::array<float, kSubFramesInFrame> FixedDigitalLevelEstimator::ComputeLevel(
54 const AudioFrameView<const float>& float_frame) {
55 RTC_DCHECK_GT(float_frame.num_channels(), 0);
56 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(float_frame.samples_per_channel(), samples_in_frame_);
57
58 // Compute max envelope without smoothing.
59 std::array<float, kSubFramesInFrame> envelope{};
60 for (size_t channel_idx = 0; channel_idx < float_frame.num_channels();
61 ++channel_idx) {
62 const auto channel = float_frame.channel(channel_idx);
63 for (int sub_frame = 0; sub_frame < kSubFramesInFrame; ++sub_frame) {
64 for (int sample_in_sub_frame = 0;
65 sample_in_sub_frame < samples_in_sub_frame_; ++sample_in_sub_frame) {
66 envelope[sub_frame] =
67 std::max(envelope[sub_frame],
68 std::abs(channel[sub_frame * samples_in_sub_frame_ +
69 sample_in_sub_frame]));
70 }
71 }
72 }
73
74 // Make sure envelope increases happen one step earlier so that the
75 // corresponding *gain decrease* doesn't miss a sudden signal
76 // increase due to interpolation.
77 for (int sub_frame = 0; sub_frame < kSubFramesInFrame - 1; ++sub_frame) {
78 if (envelope[sub_frame] < envelope[sub_frame + 1]) {
79 envelope[sub_frame] = envelope[sub_frame + 1];
80 }
81 }
82
83 // Add attack / decay smoothing.
84 for (int sub_frame = 0; sub_frame < kSubFramesInFrame; ++sub_frame) {
85 const float envelope_value = envelope[sub_frame];
86 if (envelope_value > filter_state_level_) {
87 envelope[sub_frame] = envelope_value * (1 - kAttackFilterConstant) +
88 filter_state_level_ * kAttackFilterConstant;
89 } else {
90 envelope[sub_frame] = envelope_value * (1 - kDecayFilterConstant) +
91 filter_state_level_ * kDecayFilterConstant;
92 }
93 filter_state_level_ = envelope[sub_frame];
94
95 // Dump data for debug.
96 RTC_DCHECK(apm_data_dumper_);
97 const auto channel = float_frame.channel(0);
98 apm_data_dumper_->DumpRaw("agc2_level_estimator_samples",
99 samples_in_sub_frame_,
100 &channel[sub_frame * samples_in_sub_frame_]);
101 apm_data_dumper_->DumpRaw("agc2_level_estimator_level",
102 envelope[sub_frame]);
103 }
104
105 return envelope;
106}
107
108void FixedDigitalLevelEstimator::SetSampleRate(int sample_rate_hz) {
109 samples_in_frame_ =
110 rtc::CheckedDivExact(sample_rate_hz * kFrameDurationMs, 1000);
111 samples_in_sub_frame_ =
112 rtc::CheckedDivExact(samples_in_frame_, kSubFramesInFrame);
113 CheckParameterCombination();
114}
115
116void FixedDigitalLevelEstimator::Reset() {
117 filter_state_level_ = kInitialFilterStateLevel;
118}
119
120} // namespace webrtc
